backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining ContactDetails and LeadForm types with persistent storage for lead submissions, providing query endpoints for contact info and leads, and a shared function to submit new lead forms keyed by name+phone+city.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of background image from HeroSection.tsx, replacing it with solid/gradient background while preserving content and styling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including App.tsx composition, TopBar, HeaderNav with logo, HeroSection with gradient, service/project sections, contact forms, footer, and utility components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags for "Group of King Kingdom | Complete Construction Solutions (CCS)", favicon links, Inter font preload, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component composing the full page layout with TopBar, HeaderNav, all section components (Hero, Highlights, About, Services, Portfolio, Gallery, WhyChoose, Process, Contact), Footer, and FloatingWhatsAppButton.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/con: Reusable component that renders multiple phone numbers from CONTACT_INFO config with optional icon, custom separator, and hover styling.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/cta: Empty file placeholder for a call-to-action button component.
Empty file placeholder for a WhatsApp button component.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Fea: Reusable component rendering a Lucide icon within a rounded gradient background container with navy theming and configurable className.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Flo: Fixed-position floating WhatsApp button in bottom-right corner with green background, WhatsApp icon, and link to CONTACT_INFO.whatsapp.url.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Foo: Footer component with CCS logo and branding, quick links with smooth scroll, contact details, dynamic social media icons from config, and Caffeine.ai attribution with current year.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Gal: Dialog-based lightbox component for displaying full-size images with dark overlay, close button, and responsive max dimensions.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Hea: Sticky header with CCS logo/branding, smooth-scroll navigation links (Home/About/Services/Projects/Contact), Call Now and WhatsApp CTA buttons, mobile hamburger menu, and scroll-based shadow effect.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/sec: About section displaying company information, mission/vision/values, and brand promise for Complete Construction Solutions under King Kingdom group.
Gallery section displaying 6 construction project images in a responsive grid with lightbox functionality for full-size viewing.
Contact form section with validation that submits inquiries via WhatsApp, alongside company contact information display.
Hero banner with gradient background, company tagline, service highlights, and CTA buttons for quotation and portfolio navigation.
Four-column grid showcasing key company highlights (complete construction, quality, skilled team, on-time delivery) with icons and descriptions.
Empty file placeholder for a materials/supplies section component.
Portfolio grid displaying 6 completed construction projects with images, titles, and location details in a responsive card layout.
Six-step process section explaining the construction workflow from initial contact to final handover with numbered cards.
Empty file placeholder for a projects section component.
Displays a grid of 8 construction services (house construction, renovation, grey structure, interior design, etc.) with icons, titles, and descriptions in a responsive card layout.
Renders a navy gradient section showcasing 6 reasons to choose King Kingdom (experienced team, quality work, transparent pricing, etc.) with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/Top: Top navigation bar component displaying contact information (phone numbers, WhatsApp, email, hours, address) with responsive layout and hover effects.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Centralized configuration object containing all contact information including phone numbers, WhatsApp details, email, address, and business hours.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Defines social media links configuration (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn) with a helper function to filter active links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom King Kingdom navy theme colors, typography settings, component classes for buttons/cards, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Helper functions to build WhatsApp URLs with pre-filled messages and open WhatsApp in a new window.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom navy colors, border radius variables, box shadows, animations, and typography settings for the King Kingdom brand.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking one completed feature to remove the hero section background image and replace it with solid color/gradient.
